oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photochemical studies on beta-ionyl hydrazone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LIBSU, S
SINGH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dienones
ionone
derivatives
oxidation
carotene
acid
beta-ionone
beta-ionyl hydrazone
photoisomerisation
imine
photooxygenation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Direct irradiation of degassed (N-2) n-heptane solution of (E,E)-beta-ionone hydrazone results in slow geometric isomerisation of its imine linkage whereas under non-degassed condition it is readily oxidised at both the ring double bond and the imine linkage yielding (E)-5,6-epoxy-beta-ionone.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 46(7), 1133-1136
